cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base

Class DAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base.BaseDAO
      • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.base.DAO<Entity,PK>
  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Entity's type
    PK - Primary key's type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAO<Entity,PK>

    @Repository
public abstract class DAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>
extends BaseDAO
implements IDAO<Entity,PK>
    Global DAO implementation.

    WARN: This class is only a abstract class, please create subclass by overriding getReference method.

              Condition condition)
                throws AppException
        Description copied from interface: IDAO
        List all entities in tables by fields name and condition entity.

        For developers: The return list's element type is Object[], every element of the array is the field value.
